meanings.definition: A general summary or survey of a subject.
meanings.sent1: The teacher provided an overview of the lesson before starting.
meanings.sent2: The book contains overviews of various historical events.
meanings.sent3: The overview of the movie plot made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was an overview of the cityscape, capturing its essence.
meanings.sent5: The travel brochure's overview of the destination was enticing.

meanings.definition: To give a general review or summary of something.
meanings.sent1: She overviews the main points in her presentation.
meanings.sent2: He overviews the project progress during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The comedian overviews the news in a hilarious way.
meanings.sent4: His speech overviews the challenges we may face in the future.
meanings.sent5: The guide overviews the tour itinerary for the visitors.
